question: [File: aptos-core/crates/indexer/src/models/block_metadata_transactions.rs] [Struct: BlockMetadataTransaction] [Concurrent inserts] If block metadata transactions are inserted out-of-order due to parallel processing, can this violate the unique constraint on block_height and cause indexer failures?
